Wondrous Item, Uncommon
This gauzy, charcoal-dyed cloak clasps around the neck, falling over any pack or lying comfortably underneath without impairing movement. Three times per long rest, you may, as a reaction that does not provoke opportunity attacks, activate the shroud to gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.gvdA9nPuWLck4tBl]{sanctuary} spell for 30 minutes (DC 15). Creatures who succeed against the save cannot be affected by it again until after youâ€™ve taken a long rest.
In addition, you are invisible to constructs and undead (as the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]{invisibility} spell). They cannot see you unless you act against them or the effect is dispelled. (The shroud is considered a 4th-level effect for dispelling attempts.)
